name: Fishingami
description:
Control your fishing hook using only motion through your phone! Try to catch as many cute Fishingamis as you can in this small prototype for a mobile game fishing mechanic, while enjoying a small original song. How many can you catch before the time runs out?

----------------------------

Artwork: João Ferreira
Programming: Francisco Teotónio

----------------------------

Controls:

Tilting - Everything is done by tilting your phone! Move your hook and pull fish by tilting fast towards yourself.

----------------------------

Fishingami was done during a private game jam in 48 hours (plus a few extra ones for fixes!) under the theme Fishy.  It is an experimental mobile arcade game that is controlled exclusively through tilting the phone. You can move your hook by tilting it freely in any direction, and quickly tilt it towards yourself to pull a fish that you have bumped into.

All sounds are original, and all assets are original or royalty-free resources, If you find a bug, want to give feedback, or just want to say hi, please do leave a comment!
